title: Killing Eve
description: A British thriller drama about a bored MI5 agent tracking down an international assassin.

title: First 48
description: A documentary series that follows detectives during the first 48 hours of a homicide investigation.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town uncover a government conspiracy involving supernatural forces.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Epic fantasy drama where noble families vie for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

title: The Office
description: A mockumentary that depicts the everyday lives of office employees in Scranton, Pennsylvania.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer tries to secure his family's future.

title: Friends
description: A group of friends in New York City experience life, love, and comedy together.

title: Narcos
description: A dramatized look at the history of drug cartels in Colombia and the rise of the cocaine trade.

title: The Crown
description: The life of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

title: Westworld
description: A futuristic theme park allows guests to live out their fantasies with artificial beings, until things go wrong.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy becomes a guardian to a mysterious child.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series that explores the dark side of technology and its impact on modern society.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people are often more wicked than beasts.

title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
description: A team of detectives in the NYPD solve crimes while balancing their quirky personal lives.

title: Sherlock
description: A modern update finds the famous detective and his doctor partner solving crimes in 21st century London.

title: House of Cards
description: A ruthless politician and his equally ambitious wife navigate the corridors of power in Washington, D.C.

title: True Detective
description: A crime anthology series that explores complex investigations across different timelines and locations.

title: Fargo
description: Various tales of crime unfold in the small town of Fargo, where nothing is ever as it seems.

title: Better Call Saul
description: The story of small-time lawyer Jimmy McGill and his transformation into the sleazy attorney Saul Goodman.

title: Peaky Blinders
description: A gangster family epic set in 1919 Birmingham, England, centered on the Peaky Blinders gang.
